class camera_simulator.Lens(height: int = 0, width: int = 0)[source]¶

Bases: camera_simulator.BaseProcessor

Lens class childer of BaseProcessor Simple Lens emulator

height¶

height of the emulated camera Lens

Type

int

height¶

width of the emulated camera Lens

Type

int

property height¶

changes the height of the Lens property

Type

int

process(image)[source]¶
Validates that the shape of the input numpy data matches the Lens

height and width properties.

Parameters

image – 2D numpy data.

Returns

image if height and width matches the Lens and if the process method is enabled

Raises

  • ValueError – Shape of the image does not match the Lens

  • ValueError – Process is not enabled

property width¶

width of the sensor property

Type

int

class camera_simulator.Sensor(gain=1)[source]¶

Bases: camera_simulator.BaseProcessor

Sensor class childer of BaseProcessor

Simple sensor emulator

gain¶

digital camera setting that controls the amplification of the signal from the emulated camera sensor

Type

int

property gain¶

gain of the sensor property

Type

int

process(image)[source]¶

apply the gain to the image

Parameters

image – 2D numpy data.

Returns

image*gain if the process method is enabled

Raises

ValueError – Process is not enabled
